actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate a certain portion of the St. John River in Maine as a potential addition to the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.

summary.text: Amends the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate a specified portion of the Saint John River in Maine as a potential addition to the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate a certain portion of the St. John River in Maine as a potential addition to the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.
